sentences.sentence: Alexander McQueen in 2010 released a set of armadillo shoes.
sentences.translation: 亚历山大·麦克奎恩在2010年发布了一套犰狳鞋。

sentences.sentence: Architect Robin Partington has the Gherkin, the Razor (right), the Armadillo in Glasgow, and the Cucumber (above) on his CV.
sentences.translation: 建筑师罗宾·帕丁顿的简历上有小黄瓜，剃刀（右），格拉斯哥的犰狳和黄瓜（上）。

sentences.sentence: I have never seen the armadillo.
